dotaitem.Info: Use a charge to consume a tree. Restores the user's HP slowly over time.
It is used to restore HP and Mana over a short period of time.
Teleport to a target point. If damage is taken from a player or Roshan, blink dagger will be disabled for a few seconds.
Grants Spell Immunity. Duration decreases with each use. Some abilities are able to pierce through Spell Immunity.
Upgrades the spells of heroes. Applies all of its effects to the user.
The Aegis of the Immortal brings the hero who holds it back to life with full health and mana a few seconds after death.
Increases lifesteal for a short time, regenerating twice the damage dealt for each hit.
Will slow the movement speed and attack speed of the enemy target on attack.
Gives bonus damage for 350 and Drops on death and cannot be destroyed.
